Name: atypical hereditary sensory neuropathy
Definition: A hereditary sensory neuropathy characterized by late onset of sensory ataxia without ulcerating acropathy or autonomic abnormalities.

Name: hereditary sensory and autonomic neuropathy type 2
Definition: A hereditary sensory neuropathy characterized by progressively reduced sensation to pain

Name: hereditary sensory and autonomic neuropathy type 1
Definition: A hereditary sensory neuropathy characterized by slowly progressing

Name: Riley-Day syndrome
Definition: A peripheral nervous system disease that involves an acute loss of function of the lumbar plexus
